content: > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 2 **type ** christmas tree ornament **skill level ** easy **size ** 3 75 - 4 x 3 **materials** - 3 00 mm crochet hook - approx yardage 20 of size #4 worsted weight yarn in 2 colors - notions measuring tape yarn needle the sample was made with comfy worsted by we crochet 3 affiliate link **description** this pattern is fun easy and customizable for use in your home the design is made in 2 separate pieces then seamed together and if you add a bit of stuffing between the pieces you can have a fabulous 3d effect no refunds on digital products you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms and tested by outside testers you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos this pattern is in pdf form and includes full color photos copyright @ divine debris 2024 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //www ravelry com/redeem/divine-debris code=cuteornament 2 https //divinedebris com/free-cute-cup-ornament-crochet-pattern/ 3 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=726901&u=1291909&m=59159&urllink=www%2eknitpicks%2ecom%2fyarn%2fcomfy%2dworsted%2fc%2f5420171&afftrack=
